item.description:
I know that we all wanted to go for white water rafting... so this is your chance. This is almost a complete day's trip.

This will cover level 1,2 and 3. (Beginner levels).

Event: White water rafting in Deerfield River - Fife Brook Section

When: I have scheduled late in August so that everyone has enough time to plan ;) . Any saturday before that is alomost booked also. So dont wait on this for long.

Brief description:
"This beautiful ten mile trip through mild whitewater is the perfect outing. Daily dam control ensures fun, easy rapids such as "Sideways Splash", "Freight Train" and "Pinball". Calm sections allow your guide to fill you in on local history and to enjoy the breathtaking scenery. The self-bailing rafts approach "Zoar Gap", the day's biggest rapid, at Mile 5. After safely navigating this exciting Class III stretch, we serve a hearty riverside picnic lunch. The second half of the trip has fun spots such as "Roger Rapid", "MInefield", opportunities to get out of the boat and float or engage in team water fights. Bring your family or a group of friends on this trip for the perfect introduction to whitewater rafting."

Link to the official page from the company: http://crabapplewhite...

Here is how to book your ticket:


  • Call 1800-553-7238 ( 9 AM to 10 PM Mon-Fri )
  • tell them you want to book for "Aug-22" for "Deerfield River - Fife Brook Section" with "Sam Seth's Meetup"
  • Pay the amount [$89+ taxes]... its worth it.
  • RSVP "yes" in the meetup with comments that you have "Paid"
  • semd me your contact number so that i can keep you informed.


Now that you have booked, here are some other details.

Where do we meet :
2056 Mohawk Trail, Charlemont, MA 01339.... the trip starts at 9:30 we need to leave at 7. we will be done by 3PM. Lunch is served there so you do not need to bring anything.

How do we get there:
You have the option to carpool and/or reach there by yourself. Its about 2 hrs of drive from Boston area depending on where you live.

if we need a meeting place, if could me my place... this way we all can meet at one place and then drive together.... (more details on this as people sign up)

want to carpool or do u have space inyour car...send me your tel number and i will contact other people for you.

Also, i will have meetups planned before that we can all meet each other other before this event

in case you have questions, call me : 978-821-3587,
Sam.
